Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, princess. It's about time to get
going.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're gonna go see the stars with me,
right? Come on, let's go.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...And we've arrived. You're not cold,
are you, babe?
<PAGE>
Don't hold back if you are, my open
arms are waiting for ya.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. It's that starry
sky you wanted to see so bad.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The night sky's sure a beautiful sight.
Having you to look at the stars with
makes it all the more exquisite.
I want you to tell me I'm beautiful.
I wish we could stay here forever.
I think I'm coming down with a cold.
How romantic!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, my. Jealous of the night sky, are
we?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>If you really to hear me say it that
bad, fine. Here, come in closer.
<PAGE>
...You're, beautiful, princess. Even 
more so than the stars in the sky.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a pretty cute wish you just made.
I'll stay here and watch the stars with
you until you're satisfied.
<PAGE>
...Unless you start sneezing, then we'll
head home. I can't let you go and catch
a cold on me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Even if you're cold, you better hold
back on the sneezing if you want to stay
out here longer.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you do catch a cold, you can count on
my constant and courteous care to nurse
you back to health.
<PAGE>
You'll kick that cold in no time with my
help.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, It's a special occasion. Now let's
get back to being sweethearts and enjoy
our date and this wonderful sky.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Let's come out here to see the stars
every year... Even when we're old and
grey.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Princess, you know what's coming...
Close you eyes.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a nice happy face you've got
there. Makes me want to give you
another kiss.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Uh-oh, that was a sneeze, wasn't it?
You'll catch a cold for real at this
rate. Let's head back.
<PAGE>
When we get home, I'll fix you up
a nice hot drink.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, home, sweet home. Your hands feel
ice cold. Best to take a nice warm bath
before bed.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I had a good time, today.
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's almost time to go and watch
the stars, just like we promised.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It will be pretty chilly tonight, so you
better layer up before we head out.
Come on, let's go.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're here! <MYNAME>, are you cold? Watch
your step!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <MYNAME>... The starry sky's so
beautiful.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sky is filled with stars. Glad we
came. They're so pretty, the way they
sparkle... just like you.
Be happy for the complement.
Be embarrassed and flustered.
Hide your embarrassment with anger.
Return the complement to Rod.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad you took the complement well.
Making you smile is what I live for.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>From now on, I'll always be by your
side and do my best to make you happy.
You can count on it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahaha! I guess I spoke a little too
frankly there.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Anyway, that's how I really feel. I
adored you when we were dating, and I
still do now that we're married.
<PAGE>
I hope you and your magical sparkle will
always stay by my side.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey now, there's no need to be angry.
Don't go and spoil that cute face of
yours.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ah, I'm sorry. I won't say stuff like
that anymore, OK?
<PAGE>
I guess saying things like that is kind
of embarrassing after you're already
married.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. I'm happy for the
compliment.
<PAGE>
I hope we can go on being a good married
couple... one that gets along and shows
their love for each other with words.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, your eyes closed?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I hope I get a kiss from you next year,
too. That would be great. Already
looking forward to it.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We'll, shall we head back to the house
soon?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, we're here. Tonight's date was
great.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let's go watch the stars again next
year.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the time has almost come for
our date. Are you ready to get going?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I hope the stars have come out for us.
Well then, let's go.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just as I thought. This mountaintop sure
is cold. I'm glad I bundled up
back at home.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, check that out. Look up. It's
a beautiful starry sky tonight.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I never get tired of looking at a star
filled sky like this one. The way the
stars sparkle sure is pretty.
<PAGE>
They remind me of a certain someone 
who's right next to me.
Be happy for the complement.
Be embarrassed and flustered.
Hide your embarrassment with anger.
Return the complement to Soseki.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's nice that you're so easy to please.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I really like that air of innocence you
have about you.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, don't ever change, OK? That's
all I ask of you.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hahaha! There's no need to get
embarrassed over a little compliment
like that.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, you really are fun to tease.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah, I'm sorry. That last bit was just
a joke. But the part about you being
beautiful, that's for real.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey now, don't get mad. It's not like
that was a lie. I meant it.
<PAGE>
Of course I don't tire of looking at
you. You're bright and full of vigor,
just like a star, see?
<PAGE>
And that's what makes married life a
pleasure for me each and every day.
Thanks for that.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uh-oh, didn't see that one coming.
I didn't really think you'd compliment
me back.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You being so honest actually
makes me a bit embarrassed. You
got me there!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, perfection. Yum.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bout time to head back to the homestead.
We stay out here any longer and you'll
catch a cold.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And we're here. Full day, huh?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was nice to get back into that
lover's mindset tonight. I hope we can
go together again next year.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the appointed hour is almost
here. Have you finished getting ready?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Shall we set off then?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We have arrived. All that walking got me
a bit hot, but the cool breeze feels oh
so nice.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, a splendid starry star lies
just  overhead. Please, take a look.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Beautiful, isn't? So pretty... Simply
mesmerizing.
<PAGE>
Anyway, the two of us gazing at the
stars together like this really takes
me back to our courtship. And you?
Yeah, it really takes me back.
Not so much for me.
Those were tough times.
I'm happier now.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yes, yes. When we first started dating,
I was so afraid of losing your favor and
sometimes I felt anxious.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But we took it one step at a time, and
look at us now... married. I feel that
we share quite a strong bond these days.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Is that right... It's too bad we can't
share the same memory.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But... just watching the stars
together with you now is enough to make
me happy.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You know, you're right. We went through
a lot.
<PAGE>
But doing so is what got us where we are
today. And today... I love you.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Hmm... I feel the same way. I think that
means we have had a lot of happy times
together up till now.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for making me so
happy. Here's to continued years of
happiness together.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... come here.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, shall we be on our way home soon?
Anymore of this winter wind and we might
end up with colds.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, here we are. You seemed a bit cold?
Let's get you properly warmed up.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight was wonderful. Let's go to see
the stars again next year.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you ready yet? It's almost
time. Let's get a move on.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
All right, let's go. It's been a while
since we've gone out together like this.
I'm looking forward to it.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
And we're here. I knew it would be this
cold. <MYNAME>, are you all right?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, take a look up. You might even
forget how cold it is.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The stars... so pretty. I'm glad we
came.
<PAGE>
Anyway, when the two of us go out like
this, it's like  we've returned to our
dating days, huh?
Yeah, it really takes me back.
I don't really feel that way.
Those were tough times.
I'm happier now.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...When we first started dating, I
fumbled around with just about
everything.
<PAGE>
I wasn't able to express my feelings
very well, and I even said some pretty
harsh things to you...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So, what I haven't been able to give
you before, I'll work double time now
to be nice.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
And yet, you're smiling as you say that.
It looks like we're both the defiant
type, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You know, I changed after I started
dating you... and I'm happy I did.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I want you to know what that
means to me. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yeah, that's true. We went through a
lot. I'm glad we can be all smiles now,
though.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>There will probably still be some hard
times in the future... But let's get
passed them together.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Ah... Is that right? Well, happy to hear
it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>The fact that you don't even hesitate
to say something like that is pretty
amazing.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...And I say that as a big complement.
You know, that's actually one of the
things I really like about you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... I love you.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
No matter how many times I kiss
you, it never gets old. My heart
is racing.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
About time to head back to the
house. Let's make our way quickly
then get a nice hot drink at home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah... finally back. The stars are pretty
nice, but nothing beats home, sweet
home.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad we went out to see the stars
tonight. Let's go again next year.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's almost time. Are you
ready?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wonder what kind of starry sky is 
waiting for us this year. Well, let's
get going.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We have arrived. It wasn't an easy
journey down that snowy road, but you
handled it well, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The sky is just filled to
the brim with stars.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
These beautiful stars make me happy
from the bottom of my heart that I
came here with you tonight.
I want you to tell me I'm beautiful.
I wish we could stay here forever.
I think I'm coming down with a cold.
How romantic.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, of course I think you're beautiful,
too, <MYNAME>. The stars don't have
anything on you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...<MYNAME>, what's wrong?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>D-Don't get so red in the face. I'm
actually the one who is embarrassed
here.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
That sounds fine to me... But we're
heading home the minute you start
sneezing, all right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>I can't let my precious sweetheart
catch a cold, after all.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Even if you do catch a cold, <MYNAME>,
I'll be right by your side to care for
you. You'll get better in no time!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So, just relax and gaze at the stars
to your heart's content.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We're surrounded by great scenery. This
is an occasion for us to go back to our
time dating and enjoy the starry sky.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I hope we can go out like this each
and every year to watch the stars...
Just the two, even when we get old.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I love you... <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, you're blushing. I bet my
face is red, too.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>... Did I just hear you sneeze?
<PAGE>
At this rate, you really will get sick.
Come on, let's head home.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, so nice to be home. Your hands are
like ice. I think it's best that you
take a bath to warm up.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today was very fun. Thank you, <MYNAME>.
Let's go again together next year too.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's almost time. All done
getting ready?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
OK, let's go! And we're off.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Waa, it's sure cold. <MYNAME>, are
you all right? Want to get in a little
closer?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, look at that! The sky is full of
stars tonight.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Those stars are really pretty. It really
makes the perfect setting for a date
with my lovely husband.
You're even prettier than the stars.
I wish we could stay here forever.
I think I'm coming down with a cold.
How romantic!

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Don't just spout something
like that out so easily... It's a bit
embarrassing, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But... Thanks. That actually makes
me really happy.
<PAGE>
I better work hard so that you say the
same nice things about me next year.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That was kind of a girly thing to say. 
<MYNAME>, you're so cute.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah, you're blushing. Hehehe.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I kid, I kid. <MYNAME>, you're
actually cool and manly.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you okay? Even if you do catch a
cold, I'll be right there to nurse you
back to health.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So let's keep watching the stars,
even if it's just for a little longer...
okay?

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Well, we have this great scenery! This
is an occasion for us to go back to our
time dating and enjoy the starry sky.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Let's keep going out like this every
year to watch the stars. Always... Even
when we're old and gray.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Love you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee... Yum.

<FACE_TINA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, did I detect a sneeze from you?
You really will catch a cold at this
rate. Wanna head back soon?
<PAGE>
When we get home, I'll fix you up
a nice hot drink, all right.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, home, sweet home. By the way, thanks
for today.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's go and see the stars again next
year. It's a promise!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you promised we'd go and
look at the starry sky tonight, right?
It's almost time.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
It's gonna be pretty cold tonight, so
bring something I can throw on when
I get chilly, OK? Well, let's go now.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
We're here! Me feet are tired. I'm glad
we don't have to walk anymore.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Anyway, the two of us made it now,
but you might have to carry me home
piggyback.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Enough of the jokes... Let's check out
that night sky. Go ahead, <MYNAME>,
take a look.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It was definitely worth it to come
out here for a sky full of stars like
this. So pretty... just like me!
I agree.
I don't know what to say.
I don't know about that.
You're prettier than the stars.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
W-Wait a minute. How can you agree so
easily. I was just kidding, so don't
be so serious.
<PAGE>
If you were actually being serious when
you said that, I wouldn't know how to
respond.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey... <MYNAME>. Why are you so quiet?
You should just be a good boy and agree
with me at times like this.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Huh? What did you just say? My ears must
be playing tricks on me. Go ahead, say
that one more time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>So you say I'm cute. Oh, <MYNAME>,
sometimes you're too honest for
your own good.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Saying something like that... You really
do love me, don't you, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Well, that's not a bad thing. In fact,
I'll take that compliment. So, thank 
you.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, you know what I'm about to do,
right?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Tee-hee. It's been a good date tonight.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, about time to be heading
home. This strong wind will be the end
of my hair.

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, I'm tired. <MYNAME>, will you make
me a hot drink in a bit?

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you're up for it, let's go and gaze
at the stars next year, too. I'm already
looking forward to it.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, it's almost time for our date.
Are you... ready yet?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The stars... I hope they're out shining
tonight. Well, let's go.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sure is cold up here... Glad I layered
up back at home.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh... <MYNAME>. Up, look up at that
beautiful night sky.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's so full of stars. It's always worth
coming out to look at. All shining and
so beautiful...
Just like you, Yuri.
I wish we could stay here forever.
I think I'm coming down with a cold.
How romantic!

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Do you really mean that, <MYNAME>?
I'm a little embarrassed, but I'm happy
to hear that. Thanks.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That sounds just like something a girl
would say. Very cute, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Ah, you're turning red. Hehehe.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's OK... Even if you catch a cold,
I'll be by your side to nurse you back
to health.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>So, let's stay out here a bit
longer and watch the stars, okay?

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yeah... How about just tonight we relive
our courting days and really enjoy this
date.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, let's keep going to see the
stars like this every year... Even when
we're old and grey.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Oh, <MYNAME>...

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Thanks... for the kiss.

<FACE_YURI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, you just sneezed. We stay out
any longer and you'll catch a cold.
Let's go back soon.
<PAGE>
When we get home... I'll make you a
nice hot drink.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah... We're back. You deserve a nice
rest.

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight reminded me of our dating days.
This was so much fun. I hope we can go
again next year.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, the appointed hour is almost
upon us. Are you ready?

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, let's go.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, we have arrived. All that walking
got me a bit hot, but the cool breeze
feels oh so nice.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, a splendid starry star awaits
overhead. Please, go and have a look.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Beautiful, isn't? So beautiful... 
Simply mesmerizing.
<PAGE>
Anyway, the two of us watching the stars
together like this really takes me back
to our dating days. And you?
Yeah, it really takes me back.
Not so much for me.
I'm happier now.
Those were tough times.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Yes, yes. When we first started dating,
I was so afraid of losing your favor
sometimes I couldn't just be myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But we took it one step at a time, and
look at us now... married. I feel that
we share quite a strong bond these days.
<PAGE>
I hope that going forward we can
strengthen and build that bond and
continue to be a harmonious couple.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You know, you're right. We went through
a lot.
<PAGE>
But doing so is what got us where we are
today. And today... I love you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm... I feel the same way. I think
that means we have had a lot of happy
times together up till now
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you for making me so
happy. Here's to continued years of
happiness together.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that right... It's too bad we can't
share the same memory.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But... just watching the stars
together with you now is enough to make
me happy.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>... Thank you.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, shall we be on our way home soon?
Anymore of this winter wind and we might
end up with colds.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
So, <MYNAME>, were you cold? Make sure
you get nice and warmed up.

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Tonight was a wonderful time. Let's go
